name: Zucchini with Mushrooms

instructions.en: Cut the zucchinis in half lengthwise, then slice into 1/4-1/2-inch thick half moons. Slice the mushrooms and mince the garlic if not already prepared.
instructions.sk: Rozrežte cukety pozdĺžne na polovicu, potom nakrájajte na 0,6-1,3 cm hrubé polmesiace. Nakrájajte huby a nasekajte cesnak, ak ešte nie sú pripravené.
instructions.ja: ズッキーニを縦半分に切り、さらに1/4〜1/2インチ（約0.6〜1.3cm）の厚さの半月形に切ります。マッシュルームをスライスし、ニンニクをみじん切りにします（まだ準備されていない場合）。

instructions.en: Heat the oil and a little butter (if using) in a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat.
instructions.sk: Rozohrejte olej a trochu masla (ak používate) vo veľkej panvici na strednom ohni.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで中火で油と少量のバター（使用する場合）を熱します。

instructions.en: Add the sliced zucchini, mushrooms, and minced garlic to the pan. Sauté until the vegetables are just tender, stirring occasionally.
instructions.sk: Pridajte do panvice nakrájanú cuketu, huby a nasekaný cesnak. Opekajte za občasného miešania, kým zelenina nezmäkne.
instructions.ja: スライスしたズッキーニ、マッシュルーム、みじん切りにしたニンニクをフライパンに加えます。時々かき混ぜながら、野菜がちょうど柔らかくなるまで炒めます。

instructions.en: Season with salt and pepper to taste.
instructions.sk: Ochuťte soľou a korením podľa chuti.
instructions.ja: 塩コショウで味を調えます。

notes: This simple side dish is quick to prepare and cook. Be careful not to overcook the vegetables - they should be tender but still have a slight crunch. You can adjust the thickness of the zucchini slices based on your preference.
